result.eng: The accommodaton costs were higher than we thought.

result.orig: Bhí costas an lóistín níos airde ná mar a cheap muid

result.ponchtml: Ḃí costas an lóistín níos airde ná mar a ċeap muidThe accommodaton costs were higher than we thought.

result.eng: I almost thought I wouldn't be paid.
result.ga: Is beag a cheap mé go n-íocfaí mé
result.orig: Is beag a cheap mé go n-íocfaí mé
result.html: Is beag a cheap mé go n-íocfaí méI almost thought I wouldn't be paid.
result.ponchtml: Is beag a ċeap mé go n-íocfaí méI almost thought I wouldn't be paid.

result.eng: The book gave me food for thought.

result.orig: Thug an leabhar ábhar machnaimh dom
result.html: Thug an leabhar ábhar machnaimh domThe book gave me food for thought.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug an leaḃar áḃar maċnaiṁ domThe book gave me food for thought.

result.eng: This is way bigger than I thought.

result.eng: I thought Aoife was working tonight.
result.ga: Shíl mé go raibh Aoife ag obair anocht
result.orig: Shíl mé go raibh Aoife ag obair anocht

result.eng: He thought he'd faint from the sickness.
result.ga: Cheap sé go dtitfeadh sé i laige leis an tinneas
result.orig: Cheap sé go dtitfeadh sé i laige leis an tinneas

result.eng: I thought it was silly of us to argue.
result.ga: Cheap mé gur sheafóideach an mhaise dúinn a bheith ag argóint

result.eng: She thought punctuality didn't suit the American Indian perspective on life.
result.ga: Shíl sí nár thit poncúlacht isteach le dearcadh saoil na Meiriceánach Dúchasach
result.orig: Shíl sí nár thit poncúlacht isteach le dearcadh saoil na Meiriceánach Dúchasach

result.eng: "Some fool was flying tourists around Manhattan and went to close to the building", I thought.
result.ga: Amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall Manhattan agus a chuaigh róchóngarach don fhoirgneamh a shíleas
result.orig: Amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall Manhattan agus a chuaigh róchóngarach don fhoirgneamh a shíleas

result.ponchtml: Amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall Manhattan agus a ċuaiġ róċóngaraċ don ḟoirgneaṁ a ẛíleas"Some fool was flying tourists around Manhattan and went to close to the building", I thought.

result.eng: One [TV] presenter thought there was no airplane involved at all, and that it was a bomb.

result.eng: He thought he should recognize his voice.
result.ga: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithne
result.orig: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithne
result.html: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithneHe thought he should recognize his voice.

result.eng: Babaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ga: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.orig: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é

result.ponchtml: Dar le Babaí gurḃ é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aiṫne aċ ní raiḃ dul aici smaoineaṁ cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
